answers.answer: The platform provides information on various types of support, including housing, access to a call center, education, health services, transport, and job opportunities. It also offers information on staying safe and help for PTSD.
answers.instruction: Go to website https://dopomoha.ro/en/main-page and read the section under 'Support Housing Call center Education Health Transport Jobs Stay safe PTSD Help'.

answers.answer: Individuals fleeing a war zone are welcomed to Romania and can enter through any official border crossing. The platform also provides information on how to stay safe and assistance for PTSD.
answers.instruction: Go to website https://dopomoha.ro/en/main-page and read the section under 'Stay safe PTSD Help'.

answers.answer: The platform offers relevant information about seeking protection in Romania, including details on legal status and simplified explanations of the law.
answers.instruction: Go to website https://dopomoha.ro/en/main-page and read the section under 'Legal status Info Law made simple'.

answers.answer: The provided content describes the types of information and support available to refugees but does not specify when they can expect to receive assistance.
answers.instruction: Go to website https://dopomoha.ro/en/main-page and read the page carefully.

answers.answer: The provided content does not contain information on how people can contribute to helping refugees. It focuses on the services and information available to those seeking protection.
answers.instruction: Go to website https://dopomoha.ro/en/main-page and read the page carefully.
